name: IntraOcular
description:
This game is meant to be played with a  controller that has 2 joysticks, but if you don't have this, you can use AWSD, and arrow keys (Keyboard controls definitely not as fun to play this way though).

WebGL version should work fine, but a downloadable is available just in case!

The game of this goal is to complete your eye surgery by keeping your eyes looking forward.

Controls:

South Game Pad Button: Start game on Main Menu

Left Joystick(or AWSD): Controls the left eye from the players perspective

Right Joystick(or Arrow keys): Controls the right eye from the players perspective
